name: @SUMA_AlignToExperiment
author: AFNI Developers
description: Creates a version of Surface Anatomy that is registered to Experiment Anatomy.

inputs.name: Experiment Anatomy
inputs.description: Name of high resolution anatomical data set in register with experimental data.

inputs.name: Surface Anatomy
inputs.description: Path and name of high resolution antomical data set used to create the surface.

inputs.name: Resolution for Downsampling
inputs.description: Optional parameter to downsample anatomical volumes to dxyz mm voxel resolution before registration.

inputs.name: Output Voxel Size
inputs.description: Output the final aligned volume at a cubic voxelsize of DXYZmm.

inputs.name: Use 3dWarpDrive
inputs.description: Use 3dWarpDrive's general affine transform (12 param) instead of 3dvolreg's 6 parameters.

inputs.name: Use 3dAllineate
inputs.description: Use 3dAllineate to do the 12 parameter alignment. Cost function is 'lpa'.

inputs.name: Options for 3dAllineate
inputs.description: Specify set of options to pass to 3dAllineate.

inputs.name: OK Change View
inputs.description: Be quiet when view of registered volume is changed to match that of the Experiment_Anatomy.

inputs.name: Strip Skull
inputs.description: Use 3dSkullStrip to remove non-brain tissue.

inputs.name: Options for 3dSkullStrip
inputs.description: Pass the options to 3dSkullStrip.

inputs.name: Align Centers
inputs.description: Add an additional transformation to align the volume centers.

inputs.name: Initial Transform
inputs.description: Apply affine transform file to Surface_Anatomy before beginning registration.

inputs.name: Clip Below
inputs.description: Set slices below CLPmm in 'Experiment Anatomy' to zero.

inputs.name: Prefix for Output
inputs.description: Prefix for the output volume.

inputs.name: Surface Anatomy Followers
inputs.description: Apply the same alignment transform to additional datasets.

inputs.name: Interpolation Mode
inputs.description: Set the interpolation mode for the follower datasets.

inputs.name: Atlas Followers
inputs.description: Automatically set the followers to be atlases in the directory of -surf_anat.

inputs.name: Echo Commands
inputs.description: Echo all commands to terminal for debugging.

inputs.name: Keep Temporary Files
inputs.description: Keep temporary files for debugging.

inputs.name: Overwrite Response
inputs.description: Answer 'overwrite' questions automatically.
